about_me.des: I am a first-year PhD student in Computer Science at University of Georgia. My research interests are in Big Data Systems, Data Science, Machine Learning with a focus on Computer Vision.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.phd_des: After fulfilling visa obligations, came back to start PhD in Computer Science.
career.lmkr_des: Worked in their R&D wing of GeoGraphix group in general and SeisVision and GVERSE products in particular.
career.uga_des: Graduated with MS in Computer Science from University of Georgia under Fulbright Scholarship
career.microsoft_des: Interned during the Summer of 2013 at Redmond, WA.
career.bentley_des: Joined Bentley Systems as a Software Engineer and played soccer (the REAL football :)
career.nuces_des: Graduated with a BS in Computer Science from NUCES, Islamabad Campus.
